title: Cheat’s salmon coulibiac
description: James Martin takes all the fuss out of this decadent showpiece dish so you have more time to spend with your guests.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz mixed fresh exotic mushrooms, such as shiitake or enoki, cleaned and sliced
1 whole salmon (approximately 3kg/6lb 12oz), skin scaled and removed, gutted, pin boned and filleted (alternatively use ready prepared sides of salmon)
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
